import React from 'react' import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/custom-button.component' import CartItem from '../cart-item/cart-item.component' import { toggleCartHidden } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import './cart-dropdown.styles.scss' const CartDropdown = ({ history, dispatch }) => (
{ cartItems.length ? (cartItems.map( item => ())) :(Cart is Empty ) }
{ history.push('/checkout') dispatch(toggleCartHidden()) }}> CHECKOUT NOW
) export default withRouter(CartDropdown)
